name: Gravity Sling (honorius)
description:
Send the space probe back to Earth by using the gravities of other bodies to slingshot you in the right direction. 5 levels with increasing difficulty and dynamism.  Hold down left click  to aim the probe and hit L to launch it. Approximate playtime: 15 mins - 1 hr.

This game will be further developed to bring more content in the near future.

Made in Python with Pygame.

Credits: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uYap3tyX2mEi86KUzFbAHxgFZFux8QNvMo-bq4kNZ_U/...
